attributes.action: Allow a criminal investigation into MPs expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow a criminal investigation into MPs expense for the period of standing of an MP and for all MPs for the last 13 years if possible.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
